parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the cell's right-picture. The picture is set to the end of the '''row''', the ''column'' parameter does not matter.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The picture is searched in the mission, directory, the campaign directory's dtaExt subdirectory, and the data bank (or directory).</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbSetPictureRight]] [idc, [row, column], path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first row is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> path: [[String]] - the picture's file path </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetPicture]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first row is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> path: [[String]] - the picture's file path </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetPictureRight]] [1, [0, 0], "Picture.paa"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbSetPictureRight]] [ [0, 0], "\A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Ranks\lieutenant_gs.paa"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lnbPictureRight]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
